Posts.Content: Feb 5, 2016 06:37PM gcasey wrote: thank you so much for this list. I just found out that my mom will e starting chemo ASAP and so I joined in order to learn and help her. I am looking for any info I can to support her and help her prepare. This list is a great place to start. Thank you so much for sharing what you have learned from your own experience
Posts.Title: More Tips (and a Shopping List) for Getting Through Chemo rock MinusTwo
